title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.5 - Declaration box
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.5 - Declaration box

State Regulations

At all tracks the management shall provide a locked
declaration box with openings through which declaration slips may be deposited. Declarations shall close at 9 a.m. and such box shall not be opened until
thereafter unless otherwise specified in the conditions, or unless another hour
is approved by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
